ComicInfo.Summary: Who is the new Vampirella? Or is the real question, who are the new Vampirellas? As the Gore virus begins to spread, the answer may provide mankind's last, best hope. If the last page of issue #1 floored you just wait till you see the end of this one! The re-invention of Vampirella continues! Features four covers celebrating the 40th Anniversary of Vampirella by Arthur Suydam, Dan Brereton, Simone Gabrielli, and a cover by Daniel Sampere revealing the new Vampirella!
ComicInfo.Tags: Lauren,Kelly,Vampirella,The Cult of Chaos,Lord Gore,Vampirella Army,Pendragon
ComicInfo.Title: The Curse of Vampirella, Part 2
